sections.title: History Is For Everyone
sections.description: A platform for Revolutionary War-era American towns to share their history and attract visitors for America's 250th anniversary.

sections.label: Intention
sections.text: Make local American history accessible and engaging for modern audiences.

sections.label: What I did
items: Built multi-tenant Next.js platform with Supabase backend
Created agent system for continuous content generation
Implemented structured data for SEO optimization
Designed editorial voice system for consistent content

sections.label: What surprised me
sections.text: How much AI can help with research and content creation when given the right constraints and editorial guidelines.

sections.label: Next iteration
sections.text: Expanding to more towns and adding interactive features for visitors.
